io.lettuce.core.resource

类 DefaultClientResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lettuce.core.resource.DefaultClientResources
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ClientResources

    public class DefaultClientResources
extends Object
implements ClientResources
    Default instance of the client resources.

    The DefaultClientResources instance is stateful, you have to shutdown the instance if you're no longer using it.

    DefaultClientResources allow to configure:
    • the ioThreadPoolSize, alternatively
    • a eventLoopGroupProvider which is a provided instance of EventLoopGroupProvider. Higher precedence than ioThreadPoolSize.
    • computationThreadPoolSize
    • a eventExecutorGroup which is a provided instance of EventExecutorGroup. Higher precedence than computationThreadPoolSize.
    • an eventBus which is a provided instance of EventBus.
    • a commandLatencyCollector which is a provided instance of CommandLatencyCollector .
    • a dnsResolver which is a provided instance of DnsResolver.
    • a timer that is a provided instance of HashedWheelTimer.
    • a nettyCustomizer that is a provided instance of NettyCustomizer.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.4

      • shutdown

        public Future<Boolean> shutdown(long quietPeriod,
                                long timeout,
                                TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Shutdown the ClientResources.
        指定者:
        shutdown 在接口中 ClientResources
        参数:
        quietPeriod - the quiet period as described in the documentation
        timeout - the maximum amount of time to wait until the executor is shutdown regardless if a task was submitted during the quiet period
        timeUnit - the unit of quietPeriod and timeout
        返回:
        eventually the success/failure of the shutdown without errors.

      • eventLoopGroupProvider

        public EventLoopGroupProvider eventLoopGroupProvider()
        从接口复制的说明: ClientResources
        Returns the EventLoopGroupProvider that provides access to the particular event loop groups. lettuce requires at least two implementations: NioEventLoopGroup for TCP/IP connections and io.netty.channel.epoll.EpollEventLoopGroup for unix domain socket connections (epoll). You can use DefaultEventLoopGroupProvider as default implementation or implement an own EventLoopGroupProvider to share existing EventLoopGroup's with lettuce.
        指定者:
        eventLoopGroupProvider 在接口中 ClientResources
        返回:
        the EventLoopGroupProvider which provides access to the particular event loop groups

      • eventExecutorGroup

        public EventExecutorGroup eventExecutorGroup()
        从接口复制的说明: ClientResources
        Returns the computation pool used for internal operations. Such tasks are periodic Redis Cluster and Redis Sentinel topology updates and scheduling of connection reconnection by ConnectionWatchdog.
        指定者:
        eventExecutorGroup 在接口中 ClientResources
        返回:
        the computation pool used for internal operations

      • ioThreadPoolSize

        public int ioThreadPoolSize()
        从接口复制的说明: ClientResources
        Returns the pool size (number of threads) for IO threads. The indicated size does not reflect the number for all IO threads. TCP and socket connections (epoll) require different IO pool.
        指定者:
        ioThreadPoolSize 在接口中 ClientResources
        返回:
        the pool size (number of threads) for all IO tasks.

      • computationThreadPoolSize

        public int computationThreadPoolSize()
        从接口复制的说明: ClientResources
        Returns the pool size (number of threads) for all computation tasks.
        指定者:
        computationThreadPoolSize 在接口中 ClientResources
        返回:
        the pool size (number of threads to use).

      • timer

        public Timer timer()
        从接口复制的说明: ClientResources
        Returns the Timer to schedule events. A timer object may run single- or multi-threaded but must be used for scheduling of short-running jobs only. Long-running jobs should be scheduled and executed using ClientResources.eventExecutorGroup().
        指定者:
        timer 在接口中 ClientResources
        返回:
        the timer.
